channel.title: NPC Dialogue?
channel.description: Well i had a bunch of npcs where you would talk to them and the dialogue box would come up. Now all of a sudden out of nowhere it doesnt work? Like yesterday i clicked talk-to on a wizard at yanille, and a castle wars shop came up. Now today it won't? No npc shops or npc dialogues are workin. Any clue?

item.title: NPC Dialogue?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

npc first click looks like dis

case 155: //first Click npc int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000); int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; faceNPC(NPCSlot); boolean FishingGo = false; boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
Then it starts with all the npcs and wat they say or the wanneTalk crap.

Read full topic
